## Task class

A subclass of [HookDriver](./processor.hookdriver.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Task<Hooks extends BaseHooks<Hooks>, HookName extends keyof Hooks> extends HookDriver<Hooks, HookName> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [HookDriver](./processor.hookdriver.md)<!-- -->&lt;Hooks, HookName&gt;

## Remarks

Task class can only be instantiated by [TaskManager.task()](./processor.taskmanager.task.md) with [TaskOptions](./processor.taskoptions.md)<!-- -->.
